metadata.synopsis: One line combat AD for Warrior Gronag in the Drider Caravan
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get in to combat with the Drider caravan in SCL

0.speaker: Warrior Gronag
0.text: I'll gut you in 'er name - for the Absolute!
0.context: NodeContext: 'er' here being a contraction of "her" (meaning the Absolute)
